1.2.0.en:
- Fixed a bug where the app crashes when the SSH host is not found
- Added options to set SSH options

1.3.0.en:
- Added periodic health checks and Insights for connection failures
- Improved SSH command handling (proper exit codes, async action failure, clearer logs)
- Fixed SSH connection lifecycle and flow action listener registration

1.3.1.en:
- Added a global Flow trigger for SSH command failures across devices
- Prevented app init crash when the global Flow card is missing

1.3.2.en:
- Prevented app crashes on SSH socket errors like ECONNRESET/EPIPE
- Improved error handling for common connection drop cases

1.2.1.en: Prevented app crashes on SSH socket errors, Improved error handling for common connection drop cases, new developer, new logo

1.2.2.en: Prevented app crashes on SSH socket errors, Improved error handling for common connection drop cases, new developer, new logo
